name: DT5-MERC5 Team
body:
# The New Venture Design Experience
## DT5-MERC5 Team
The University of Puerto Rico, Mayaguez has initiated a project to revolutionize tomorrow starting today. We are the Human-Centered Designers/Engineers and Marketing Team for Team 5 of the New Venture Design Experience.   
   
### The Team:   
__Engineering Section__    
    * Omar Y. Sanchez Torres    
    * Jose Ortiz Torres     
    * Carla P. Puig Mojica     
    * Christian J. Lagares Nieves     
__Marketing Section__       
    * Marielena Alcaraz      
    * Gladymar Casiano         
    * Dorianne Acosta       
    * Karelly Feliciano       
    * Fabiola Nazario       
    * Dana Alvarez       
    * Isabel C Baez Santiago             
    * Bryan Muñoz       

## Our Core Values   
We believe design and the experience associated with it should be as simple as it is powerful. Design should be developed **around the people**, **for the people** and, ultimately, **by people understanding the true needs** of the End-User. Design, as many other things in life, is meant to be beautifully simple and, yet, powerful enough to make an impact on society.      

## Design Thinking   
### What is Design Thinking?   

[Design thinking](http://www.ideo.com/about/) according to Tim Brown, President and CEO of IDEO is “a human-centered approach to innovation that draws from the designer's toolkit to integrate the needs of people, the possibilities of technology, and the requirements for business success.”      

### Design Thinking in our Core Values   

We believe the true necessities of human beings should be addressed through any means available. Our philosophy and core values envision people living the lives they were born to live, and not the lives they have to live because of their current, unmet needs.      

We are rebuilding a world that has deviated from its beauty into a chaos. Rebuilding takes time, but we are doing it, one human at a time...
